seats._: There is 1 seat for every 5 Citizens in the server.

presidential.description: A system of government where the executive branch exists separately from a legislature.
presidential._: 2 Months per term, allow consecutive terms

parliamentary.description: A system of government where the executive branch derives its democratic legitimacy from, and is held accountable to, the legislature.
parliamentary._: Cannot call snap election until 1 month after the last election. If set to 0, snap election is disabled.

directDemocracy.description: A form of democracy in which people decide on policy initiatives directly.

appointModerators.description: Citizens can appoint moderators through referendums. If false, Citizens collectively work as moderators.

appointJudges.description: Citizens can appoint judges through referendums. If false, Citizens collectively work as judges.
